HugsLib.UpdateFeatureDef.content: - [LTO] Legacy Total Overhaul |- We have just released a Stand-Alone version for Legacy Terrain as well as Add-Ons featuring stand-alone versions of LTO Terrain's Placeable Terrains / Vanilla Wall and Floor Retexture / and Asphalt floor. You can find links to these in the LTO Terrain steam workshop page. |- That's all folks!
